name: Warm & Friendly
description: Warm color palette creating an approachable and inviting atmosphere. Perfect for community platforms, wellness apps, and personal brands.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Create a welcoming, comfortable experience. Soft corners, warm colors, and friendly typography make users feel at home. Prioritize emotional connection.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Warm orange and amber tones evoke friendliness and optimism. Use soft, muted variations for backgrounds. Avoid harsh contrasts.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Rounded corners on all elements. Gentle hover transitions. Use subtle shadows for depth without harshness. Consider micro-animations for delight.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure warm colors maintain sufficient contrast. Test amber/orange text carefully for readability. Provide clear focus indicators that fit the aesthetic.
